  • About

    Hello, it's Csongor a web designer & developer who creates websites which deliver the message.

  • Skills

    I'm a native web designer working in the browser instead of Photoshop, Illustrator or wireframing tools.

  • Values

    Fast project execution and better user experience on all devices and screens.

  • Services

    Identity, Responsive web design, Front-end development, Back-end development, E-commerce, User Experience Design.

  • Technologies

    HTML5, CSS3, SASS, jQuery, Wordpress, Jekyll, PHP, Ruby, Yii, Rails, MVC.
